Welcome to PGM, Spring 2019!

July 14, 2022

We are excited to welcome you to the Spring 2019 offering of 10708 class!

A few organizational moments:

  • Lectures. This year, we offer an in-class and an online sections of the course. For students enrolled in the online section, the lectures will be live-streamed and recorded. You can find the links to all materials, including slides and video streams, on the schedule page.
  • Logistics. Please make sure to familiarize yourself with the class logistics.
  • Scribing. To sign up for scribing lecture notes, please use the spreadsheet posted on Piazza and make sure all slots for scribes 1 and 2 are filled out before signing up as scribes 3 or 4. For details on how to write up and submit your notes, please refer to the guidelines.
  • Homework assignments and projects. Release and due dates for homework assignments and project milestones are reflected in the schedule (announcements will be posted on Piazza). All the relevant information will also appear on the homework and project pages.

We are looking forward to a productive semester working with you!
